Get started
***********

.. note::
   This tutorial is focused on DQ Robotics for Matlab (master branch). However, some hints for Python and C++ are also included.



:bdg-primary:`primary`
:bdg-secondary:`secondary`
:bdg-success:`success`
:bdg-primary-line:`primary outline`
:bdg-secondary-line:`secondary outline`
:bdg-success-line:`success outline`


Cards
=====

.. grid::

    .. grid-item-card:: Only heading

    .. grid-item-card::

        Only body.

        But with multiple text paragraphs.

    .. grid-item-card:: Heading and body

        Content of the third card.

        :bdg-primary:`Sample badge`

.. grid::

    .. grid-item-card:: A card with a dropdown menu

        .. dropdown:: :fa:`eye me-1` Click to expand dropdown

            Hidden content

    .. grid-item-card:: A clickable card
        :link: https://example.com

.. grid::

    .. grid-item-card::

        panel 1 header
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
        panel 1 content
        more content
        ++++++++++++++
        panel 1 footer

    .. grid-item-card::

        panel 2 header
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
        panel 2 content
        ++++++++++++++
        panel 2 footer
